Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Class Museum

java.lang.Object
serverSide.sharedRegions.Museum
public class Museum extends Object
Museum. Is implemented as an implicit monitor. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
